description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME. Bids for specialized educational services for the delivery of training to military aircraft structures technicians must be submitted by the amended closing time. This contract includes a one (1) year base term and two (2) one-year extension options. The Contractor will provide specialized educational services consisting of four training sessions per contract year, with a maximum of twenty-four (24) military aircraft structures technicians per year. The services will be delivered in Winnipeg, and the Department of Defence has the requirements.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
### Advanced Composite Repair Service (ALEO)

#### Summary
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the provision of Advanced Composite Repair (ALEO) services for a maximum of twenty-four (24) military aircraft structures technicians per year.

#### Background
The DND requires a Contractor to deliver training services through four annual training sessions for a period of two years (2024-2026), with the option to extend by an additional one year up to 2027.

#### Requirement
The Contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing training services to a maximum of twenty-four (24) military aircraft structures technicians per year
* Delivering four annual training sessions (serials) per contract year
* Meeting the expected contract start and end dates: April 30, 2024, and March 31, 2026, respectively.

#### Contract Details
* Period of Performance: From the date of contract award to March 31, 2026, with two additional one-year option periods.
* Pricing: The contract will be awarded to the bidder who submits the lowest price according to the selection criteria.

#### Contact Information
Hemy Andrew (PSPC/SPAC)

* Email: [andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Unavailable
* Fax: Unavailable

#### Access to Tender Documents
Access the tender documents via the Ariba Discovery portal: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19595524?extsite=MTk1OTU1MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Note:** The closing time for bid submissions has been amended to May 31, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Attachments:** None

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other trade agreements listed in the full tender document.

**Service Category:** SRV

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

**Tender Status:** Cancelled. If the tender is rejected, the services will be procured using a different method.
